name: Hard Way To Heaven
description:
Are you tired of those games where you have to play long tutorials only to be familiar with the basics of the game, the lengthy character development or the microtransactions and the dlcs which give little to none content to the game? If so, then this is the game for you. Hard way to heaven is an old-school platformer game, which will take you a lot of effort to complete.
This is why there are only 2 difficulties in the game: hard and impossible. The only exception is the first level which became a lot easier than we anticipated.
If by some miracle you finish all the solo levels, 4 extra levels will appear in the menu. They seem quite similar to the other levels, but these were the original ones which were later made easier because of their extreme difficulty. We are eager to see how many of you are able to finish even one of these original levels. ;)

Main features:
• offline, split screen co-operative
• 18 levels (+4, if you prove to be worthy)
• real challenge
